title: Registration for live showcase: Mobile CT container
metaDescription: Exclusive live showcase of ScanExpress – the mobile industrial CT scanner for series testing. The event for all quality managers.

# EXPERIENCE SCANEXPRESS IN ACTION:  
Mobile CT Container for industrial series testing

Experience ScanExpress in an interactive showcase and find out how the solution fits your requirements. 

[Book a slot for viewing](#Anmeldung)

[Learn more about mobile CT](https://www.mobile-ct.eu/en/)

## Facts about the online event

### Only 1 slot per business day

Your exclusive spot in the live showcase

### Free of charge & non-binding

Compact demonstration in just 60 minutes

### Personal live demo with CT experts

Actual scan process with results and time for individual questions

## 3 reasons why you should participate

This showcase demonstrates how genuine quality issues in production can be addressed — live on site, or online:

-   **Live-Demo:** Scan of a demo component directly in the CT container with AI-supported immediate evaluation
-   **Best Practices:** Concrete measures for SOP stabilization, waste reduction, and fast approvals
-   **Exclusive terms and conditions:** Tailored rental offers for participants

**There has never been an event like this at Microvista GmbH before.** — we will show you how automatic CT inspection can be implemented on your line at short notice and in line with your requirements.

[Book a slot for viewing](#Anmeldung)

## Who benefits from participating?

This event is specially designed for decision-makers and technical experts who want to solve quality problems sustainably and optimise production processes.

**Quality directors, managers & engineers:** You are responsible for error-free production. Mobile industrial CT supports your inspection processes: faster fault identification, seamless control and AI-supported real-time evaluation. Minimise rejects and complaints – without long investment cycles.

**Production and line managers as well as process engineers:** Are unexplained causes of errors or slow approvals slowing down your production? The mobile CT container comes directly to your line – without any complicated installation. Stabilise your SOP, shorten your time-to-market and solve quality problems in real time.

**Supplier managers responsible for approvals and audits:** Do you need to ensure supplier quality and speed up approvals? The mobile CT delivers objective, reproducible test results – directly at the supplier’s premises or in the goods receiving area. Reduce approval times from days to hours.

## It's so easy to take part

### Sign in

Book a slot for a container viewing in the calendar.

### Confirmation

Check your email inbox to see if you have received a confirmation.

### Participation

Experience a live demonstration at Microvista by our CT experts.

## Online Showcase Registration Form

### Secure one of the limited free slots now

Location:

Microvista GmbH  
Am Mönchenfelde 12  
38889 Blankenburg (Harz)

For Press & Media Inquiries

Journalists, editors, and media representatives are invited to schedule individual appointments via [**presse@microvista.de**](mailto:presse@microvista.de).

We are happy to support your reporting and provide background information, visuals, or interview opportunities upon request.

## Frequently asked questions about the event

How long does the showcase last?

If you book the virtual tour, you should allow about an hour. 

Do I need to send in components?

No, demo parts are already on site.

Is there a fee for participation?

No, participation is free of charge and non-binding. However, places are limited.

Is ScanExpress suitable for serial testing?

Yes, the CT container was built for industrial series testing and features automatic AI evaluation.

What infrastructure is required for the CT container?

The CT only requires a standard power connection and floor space.

What happens after the showcase?

Upon request, we will prepare an individual rental offer for you, tailored to the duration of your testing requirements.
